terms.title: PLATFORM'S TERMS OF USE
terms.warning: Important Notice: Course Completion Project - Simulated and Fictitious Use
terms.introduction: This site is part of a course completion project and was developed with the specific purpose of presenting the concept of a communication channel between brokers and real estate agents. Please keep the following considerations in mind when using this platform :
terms.simulation: This platform does not represent a real platform for realtors and is not connected to any real estate market transactions or activities. This plataform only has academic and demonstrative purposes.
terms.fiction: Any information provided for registration, including name, address, phone numbers, emails and other details, must be entirely fictitious. It is not recommended to use real personal information. We do not use any type of information provided on this site for purposes other than just displaying and demonstrating it's functionality.
terms.responsible: By interacting with this platform, we request that you use it responsibly and respectfully. Sharing offensive, discriminatory, illegal or harmful content is not allowed.
terms.copyright: All images, logos and other visual materials used on this site are used for illustrative and demonstration purposes. Copyrights belong to their respective owners.
terms.feedback: If you wish to provide feedback on this platform, please be aware that any comments or suggestions will be considered for academic purposes and to improve the project.
terms.disclaimer1: By proceeding and using this site, you acknowledge that you are aware of the simulated and fictitious nature of this platform and agree to respect the conditions and guidelines presented here.
terms.disclaimer2: For additional information or clarifications about this course completion project, contact us through the channel indicated on the website. Thank you for your understanding and for your interest in our project.
terms.location: Federal Institute of Education, Sciente and Technoly of São Paulo - IFSP, 2023

survey.thanksforanswering: We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to fill out our form. Your responses are valuable and will help us enhance our services.
survey.referenceday: The research in question refers to the visit of the day
survey.explanationsurveysite1: We value your opinion and look forward to understand your experience during your visit to the property.
survey.explanationsurveysite2: To help us improve our services and ensure that we meet your expectations in the best way possible we ask that you leave a rating on a scale of 1 to 5, where 5 represents Very satisfied and 1 represents Very insatisfied, to indicate how well our broker has met your expectations during the visit.

questions.question4: 4 - Transparency in the Information Provided by the Broker
questions.question5: 5 - Attention to Details During the Visit
questions.question6: 6 - Clarity in the Explanation of Terms and Conditions
questions.question7: 7 - Probability of Recommending the Broker and the Property to Others
